title: Gravitation - hole drilled in an asteroid

content.question: What is the acceleration of the object when it reaches a distance <math alttext="R over 3" overflow="scroll"> <mfrac> <mi>R</mi> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> </math> from the center of the asteroid?

choices.label: <math alttext="one ninth, times the fraction G M over R squared, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one third, times the fraction G M over R squared, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 times the fraction G M over R squared, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>3</mn><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="9 times the fraction G M over R squared, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>9</mn><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one third, times the fraction G M over R squared, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><mi>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
